summary: This document contains a summary of account balances and transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's account at Deutsche Bank for the period of March 1, 2017, to March 31, 2017. It details various deposits, withdrawals, and transfers, highlighting significant financial activities during that month.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the account holder for the financial transactions detailed in the document.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

persons.name: Charles Pickett
persons.context: Charles Pickett is mentioned as the recipient of a funds transfer from Epstein's account.

connections.description: Stewart Oldfield is a bank representative providing assistance to Jeffrey Epstein regarding his account.
Charles Pickett is involved in a financial transaction where funds were transferred from Epstein's account.

events.title: Beginning Balance
events.description: The account balance as of March 1, 2017, was $592,699.94.

events.title: Ending Balance
events.description: The account balance as of March 31, 2017, was $22,819,560.81.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfer
events.description: An outgoing money transfer of $57,276.46 was made from Epstein's account.

events.title: Incoming Money Transfer
events.description: An incoming money transfer of $15,000,000.00 was credited to Epstein's account.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfers
events.description: Multiple outgoing money transfers totaling $14,750,000.00 were made to Insured Aircraft Title Service, Inc.

locations: 445 Park Ave Ste 1401, New York, NY 10022-8626
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's account had a beginning balance of $592,699.94 on March 1, 2017.
The account had an ending balance of $22,819,560.81 on March 31, 2017.
A significant incoming transfer of $15,000,000.00 was recorded on March 27, 2017.
Multiple outgoing transfers totaling $14,750,000.00 were made to Insured Aircraft Title Service, Inc. on March 28, 2017.
Stewart Oldfield is a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.
